verses.roman:
cāri-vatsara ghare pitā-mātāra sevā kailā
vaiṣṇava-paṇḍita-ṭhāñi bhāgavata paḍilā

synonyms: cāri-vatsara—for four years; ghare—at home; pitā-mātāra—of the father and mother; sevā kailā—rendered service; vaiṣṇava-paṇḍita-ṭhāñi—from a self-realized, advanced Vaiṣṇava; bhāgavata paḍilā—he studied Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam.
translation: In accordance with the instructions of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, he continuously rendered service to his mother and father for four years. He also regularly studied the Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam from a self-realized Vaiṣṇava.
